Interface GenericCrudService<T,ID>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity
ID - the type of the entity's identifier
All Known Subinterfaces:
UserService
All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImplementation
public interface GenericCrudService<T,ID>
The `GenericCrudService` interface provides a common set of CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for working with entities in a Spring Boot application.
Since:
1.0

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    delete(ID id)
    Deletes an entity by its identifier.

  • Method Details

    • search

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<T> search(org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest pageRequest)
      Retrieves a paginated list of entities based on the provided `PageRequest`.
      Parameters:
      pageRequest - the `PageRequest` object containing the pagination and sorting information
      Returns:
      a `Page` of entities

    • getAll

      List<T> getAll()
      Retrieves a list of all entities.
      Returns:
      a list of all entities

    • findById

      Optional<T> findById(ID id)
      Retrieves an entity by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the entity
      Returns:
      an `Optional` containing the entity if found, or an empty `Optional` if not found

    • update

      Optional<T> update(ID id, T user)
      Updates an existing entity with the provided data.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the entity to update
      user - the updated entity data
      Returns:
      an `Optional` containing the updated entity if successful, or an empty `Optional` if the entity was not found

    • delete

      boolean delete(ID id)
      Deletes an entity by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the entity to delete
      Returns:
      `true` if the entity was deleted, `false` if the entity was not found
